title: Swing Fitness for Older Adults
brief_description: This gentle, all new, swing movement video is designed specifically for the young at heart (30-80 years) who wish to keep supple, healthy and full of life with a minimum of effort and a maximum amount of enjoyment. If you are ready to begin exercising in the safest way possible, you are ready for this remarkable program.
